author: @WGEM
title: First Alert: Winter Storm to impact the Tri-States this weekend
text:
First Alert: Winter Storm to impact the Tri-States this weekend A winter storm watch has been issued for parts of the Tri-States (maxuser | Gray Stations with MAX) By Nico Sanchez Published: Jan. 2, 2025 at 3:58 PM CST | Updated: 4 hours ago Email This Link
Share on Facebook
Share on X (formerly Twitter)
Share on Pinterest
Share on LinkedIn
QUINCY (WGEM) - We are under First Alert, as a winter storm watch has been issued for Knox, Lewis, Marion, Ralls, Shelby, and Monroe counties in Missouri and Adams, Schuyler, Brown, Pike, and Scott counties in Illinois. This winter storm watch is for Saturday evening at 6:00pm and lasts through Monday morning at 6:00am. This watch is calling for snowfall totals between 8-11 inches, which would pose a significant travel impact across the entirety of the Tri-States.
The remainder of Thursday, a chance for a few light snow showers is in the forecast for the northern tier of the Tri-States, with scattered rain showers in the central and southern tiers of the Tri-States. Then, the chance will turn into light snow showers for the entirety of the Tri-States, dwindling into the night time hours. Temperatures will fall into the mid-20′s overnight, before only rising back into the upper-20′s to end the work week. Partly cloudy skies will remain in the forecast, with lows down into the teens.
Heading into the weekend, we will definitely be reminded that we are in January. Temperatures will rise into the mid-20′s Saturday, with increasing clouds in the forecast. Then, by Saturday night, we can expect snow to begin falling in the Tri-States. Snow is forecast to begin around midnight Sunday morning, and will last through the entire day Sunday. Snowfall total accumulations will likely be above 6″, before beginning to taper off into early Monday morning. Temperatures will remain on the cold side through the weekend, before we plummet heading into the next week.
As we move into the new week, highs will dip down into the teens, with lows in the single digits. This arctic airmass will settle for quite some time, as very cold conditions remain in the forecast into next weekend. Wind chill values will be very cold, dropping below zero during this time, therefore it is precautioned to cover up extensively when heading outside to prevent frostbite.

author: MarketScreener
title: EVISO, validation "GIRO" that turns sports activities into electricity - MarketScreener
text:
(Alliance News) - eVISO Spa on Friday announced the start of the validation phase of its new proprietary technology "EVISO.GIRO," which stores energy generated by people during sports activities to turn it into electricity and make it worth it on their bill simply by becoming an eVISO customer.
eVISO has leveraged its proprietary artificial intelligence infrastructure, used to serve more than half a million utilities, to develop a new technology called EVISO.GIRO that can create a differentiating value proposition on the Health & Fitness-sensitive utility target.
EVISO.GIRO's proprietary technology - giro.eviso.it - stores the energy from sports activities recorded by users with Health & Fitness Apps, used by more than 600 million people in 2023, to turn them into electricity to charge on their household bills.
To protect and enhance this innovation, eVISO has filed for EVISO.GIRO trademark protection with both the European Union and the U.S., thus ensuring its competitiveness and protection in the international market.
eVISO trades in the green by 1.2 percent at EUR5.16 per share.
By Claudia Cavaliere, Alliance News reporter
Comments and questions to redazione@alliancenews.com
Copyright 2024 Alliance News IS Italian Service Ltd. All rights reserved.

author: Laura Mendola
title: Percorsi abilitanti all'insegnamento: docenti siciliani rischiano l'esclusione dalle graduatorie
text:
Il deputato regionale Fabio Venezia (Pd) insieme ad altri parlamentari ha presentato un’interpellanza al presidente della regione siciliana, all’assessorato dell’istruzione e della formazione professionale “per sapere: se questo Governo non ritenga opportuno attivarsi con estrema urgenza a livello nazionale in tutti i tavoli istituzionali per chiedere al ministero dell’istruzione e del merito di rinviare la data del 30 giugno al fine di ristabilire parità di trattamento nei confronti dei docenti impegnati con i percorsi abilitanti penalizzati dai ritardi dovuti all’organizzazione didattica delle università».
La storia La vicenda riguarda i docenti precari triennalisti, che sono rimasti “imbrigliati” nei corsi organizzati dalle università siciliane di Enna, Catania e Messina per i percorsi abilitanti da 30 crediti formativi universitari, che non si concluderanno entro il 30 giugno data cruciale per il conseguimento del titolo di abilitazione e per il conseguente scioglimento della riserva per l’elenco aggiuntivo alle graduatorie provinciali per le supplenze. A causa della diversa organizzazione delle università dei percorsi abilitanti, la data di conseguimento del titolo sarà differente.
La discrasia Alcune università soprattutto quelle telematiche faranno in tempo garantendo il titolo e la possibilità di accesso al ruolo. In questo modo molti candidati non potranno sciogliere la riserva, le iscrizioni con riserva non avranno alcun effetto e decadranno. I docenti, soprattutto i riservisti triennalisti, profondamente preoccupati per questa situazione, che impedirà a molti di loro di poter lavorare durante l’anno scolastico 2025/26, nonostante i soldi spesi per i percorsi abilitanti, si sono rivolti alle direzioni dei corsi delle università dove stanno seguendo il percorso chiedendo di velocizzare i tempi e completare entro il 30 giugno, ma hanno ricevuto risposte negative.
Contemporaneamente si sono rivolti ai sindacati di categoria, per portare avanti le trattative con il ministero dell’istruzione e chiedere di rinviare la data del 30 giugno, ristabilendo una parità di trattamento nei confronti dei docenti impegnati con i percorsi abilitanti.

author: @mensup_fr
title: Héroïque, il stoppe une voiture en contresens sur l’autoroute
text:
Héroïque, il stoppe une voiture en contresens sur l’autoroute
Ce 25 décembre, sur la rocade de Montauban (Tarn-et-Garonne), un automobiliste s’est improvisé super-héro en stoppant la course folle d’une voiture en contresens.
Ce 25 décembre, sur la rocade de Montauban (Tarn-et-Garonne), un automobiliste s’est improvisé super-héro en stoppant la course folle d’une voiture en contresens.
Il n’a pas réfléchi à deux fois avant d’agir. En ce jour de Noël, un retraité originaire de Sète (Hérault) était en visite dans sa famille. Mais alors qu’il se dirigeait vers Toulouse, l’homme s’est retrouvé dans une situation plus que délicate.
Après avoir aperçu deux messages d’alerte indiquant une voiture en contresens sur l'autoroute A20, il est tombé nez à nez avec ladite voiture.
Cette dernière semait la zizanie depuis de longues minutes sur ce grand axe routier et l’homme âgé a décidé d’y mettre un terme comme il le raconte à
nos confrères de Midi Libre : “J'ai vu la voiture qui roulait à contresens en face de moi. Je l'ai vu à 300 mètres devant. C'était instinctif, je me suis dit 'il faut l'arrêter’. Je n'arrêtais pas de regarder derrière moi pour voir si je pouvais m'arrêter. Et j'ai vu que je pouvais le faire. Si j'avais été dans une courbe, je n'aurais pas pu”.
Plein de courage, le Sétois a donc gardé le cap jusqu’à ce que la voiture face à lui ne s’arrête elle aussi, à seulement un mètre de son pare-chocs.
“C'était un couple âgé, tout gentil. Ils étaient désolés, ils ne savaient pas comment faire pour repartir dans le bon sens”. Le héros du jour s’est alors improvisé agent de circulation pour bloquer la voie du milieu et permettre au couple de faire demi-tour.
Le pire a donc été évité, mais cela pose tout de même la question de l’encadrement sur l'autoroute, car, comme le précise ce bon samaritain : “Ça faisait peut-être 30 à 40 minutes que je roulais et je n'ai croisé aucun secours ni force de l'ordre”.
Ce 25 décembre, sur la rocade de Montauban (Tarn-et-Garonne), un automobiliste s’est improvisé super-héro en stoppant la course folle d’une voiture en contresens.

author: globo.com
title: Ministro do Trabalho prevê ciclo virtuoso de geração de empregos formais e de renda em 2024 | Brasil e Política | Valor Investe
text:
O ministro do Trabalho e Emprego em exercício, Francisco Macena, afirmou há pouco que a expectativa da pasta é que haja em 2024 um “ciclo virtuoso” de geração de empregos formais, com o retorno do PAC e aceleração da economia, e aumento da renda da população celetista, com o reajuste do salário mínimo.
"Expectativa é que possamos ter grande crescimento econômico em 2024 com baixa dos juros e aumento do investimento público. Acreditamos que investimentos do PAC vão impulsionar muito a geração de vagas formais", afirmou Macena ao comentar o resultado de novembro do Caged, divulgado hoje.
"Expectativa é que ano que vem possamos ter um ciclo virtuoso de geração de empregos formais e de renda. O aumento real do salário mínimo [também] vai movimentar a economia em 2024", completou.
Ele classificou como positiva a abertura líquida de 1,9 milhão de vagas formais no acumulado de janeiro a novembro deste ano e disse que o resultado de 2024 deve ser superior ao registrado neste ano.
O ministro também comentou que não acredita em demissão em massa com a reoneração parcial da folha de pagamento para os 17 setores da economia que mais empregam no país. "Acho que pode ter inclusive ampliação de empresas que podem aderir ao modelo. Não tive acesso à MP e aos anexos, mas entendi que mais empresas poderão aderir (além dos 17 setores)", afirmou.
Conteúdo publicado originalmente no Valor PRO, serviço de informação em tempo real do Valor Econômico.
Mais lidas do valor-investe 1 Investimento no Exterior Dólar cai 8,06% no ano, maior queda desde 2016. O que esperar em 2024?

author: archyde
title: Alla Martynyuk: From Ukrainian Singer to Advisor, A Story of Change and Courage
text: 2023-12-29 22:15:00 Former advisor to the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (AFU) Valery Zaluzhny Alla Martynyuk on the evening of December 29 [spoke out](https://ura.news/news/1052718760) about the death of Ukrainians at the front. She said that soldiers should not be afraid to die, because it is better to die on the battlefield than in some “ridiculous” way. After these words, the commander in chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine [refused](https://ura.news/news/1052718789) from her and stated that he does not have assistant consultants on a voluntary basis. A native of Kyiv, Alla Martynyuk built a singing career in Russia in the 2000s and was the lead singer of the group “Slivki”. URA.RU provides information about who Zaluzhny’s advisor was in the past. How Martynyuk came to Russia Alla Martynyuk was born in Kyiv on March 12, 1984. She graduated from school with a gold medal. Afterwards she studied acting at the Kiev National University of Theatre, Film and Television named after I.K. Karpenko-Kary on the course of E.O. Gulyakina. In 2002, she dropped out of school and went to conquer Moscow. In 2002-2003 she was the lead singer of the popular Russian group Slivki. In the team, she replaced Daria Ermolaeva, who had health problems. In 2003, Ermolaeva returned to the team, and Alla Martynyuk’s performances in the group ended. Since 2006, she began acting in films, making her debut in the Russian action comedy film “Insatiable”. After that, she starred in 14 more films and TV series. Alla lived in Moscow for six years and got married there for the first time. After the divorce she returned to Kyiv. Martynyuk’s attitude to the change of power in Ukraine Alla Martynyuk returned to Kyiv in 2008. In 2014, she supported Maidan and the change of power in Ukraine. Then she became a military volunteer and changed her creative career to traveling with humanitarian aid to the front and refused to work in Russia. In August 2018, she was awarded the honor of the President of Ukraine for her humanitarian participation in the “anti-terrorist operation.” The award was presented to her by the mayor of Kyiv Vitaliy Klitschko. 1703898738 #Zaluzhnys #assistant #Alla #Martynyuk #details

organizations.name: kiev national university of theatre, film and television
